attributes.action: stop this obscene bonus that the RBS directors want. They say 'pay us or we quit' - well, let them quit!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is so morally wrong that, in these dire financial times, the Directors of RBS (which is primarily owned by the taxpayer) should even consider awarding themselves the obscene bonus of 1.5 million each. We must NOT let this happen, the country is in bad enough state as it is. If it were possible to make this a crime then it should be!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
